function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insulation harboring microbiological growths due to lack of maintenance","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading airborne contaminants and diseases","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and inspection of insulation, including removal of wet or contaminated insulation","Technologies":"Use of dry vacuuming to clean dry uncontaminated insulation","People":"Occupants of the built environment, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building maintenance and management"},{"Description":"Uncertain safety and effectiveness of sealants for duct surfaces","Impact":"Potential release of dust and dirt particles in the air","Mitigation":"Adherence to EPA and NADCA guidelines for the use of sealants, application only on clean and dry duct surfaces","Technologies":"Use of approved sealants and following specific guidelines for application","People":"Maintenance staff, HVAC system technicians","Owner":"Building management, regulatory authorities"}]}
